hypothesis_content.title: Intraweek Timing Edge: Monday Morning Gap Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: BTC price gaps (>1.5%) occurring between Friday close and Monday open during NEUTRAL regimes will fade (partially fill) within the first 4 trading hours of Monday with 70% probability, providing a mean reversion timing edge.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend gaps in neutral regimes often reflect low-liquidity overreactions rather than fundamental shifts. Monday morning brings increased liquidity and institutional participation, allowing for gap fills. Neutral weekend news suggests no catalyst for sustained gap. Partial fill (50%) is more realistic than full fill.
entry_conditions: Regime = NEUTRAL (Friday close to Monday open period)
Monday open gap > |1.5%| from Friday close
Weekend news sentiment score (from crypto news API) is neutral (-0.3 to +0.3 on -1 to +1 scale)
Pre-gap Friday was not a strong trend day (>3% move)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% gap fill (e.g., if gap up 2%, take profit at 1% retracement)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Gap expands by additional 0.75% beyond open

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If <55% of such gaps fill by at least 50% within 4 hours of Monday open, the hypothesis is falsified.
